articles.headline: Report: Morice Norris at Lions' facility after scary injury
articles.description: Lions safety Morice Norris was at the team's training facility with teammates Sunday, two days after he was taken off the field in an ambulance late in a preseason game against the Falcons, The Associated Press reported.

articles.headline: Jets activate key pass rusher Jermaine Johnson from PUP list
articles.description: The Jets activated edge rusher Jermaine Johnson from the PUP list Sunday.

articles.headline: Dolphins, Bears finish in 24-24 tie in the preseason
articles.description: — Quarterback Tua Tagovailoa had an efficient start to the preseason Sunday and the Miami Dolphins and the Bears finished in a 24-24 tie in Ben Johnson’s Chicago coaching debut.

images.name: Bears, Dolphins exchange TDs in preseason tie
images.caption: The Bears-Dolphins preseason matchup ends in a 24-24 tie after exchanging a handful of touchdowns.

articles.headline: Bears, Dolphins exchange TDs in preseason tie
articles.description: The Bears-Dolphins preseason matchup ends in a 24-24 tie after exchanging a handful of touchdowns.

images.name: Bears, Dolphins exchange TDs in preseason tie
images.caption: The Bears-Dolphins preseason matchup ends in a 24-24 tie after exchanging a handful of touchdowns.

articles.headline: 2025 NFL preseason Week 1: Takeaways on new players
articles.description: How did rookies and top free agent acquisitions fare in the NFL's first full preseason week?

images.name: Shedeur Sanders [608x342]
images.credit: Scott Kinser-The USAToday Network via Imagn Images

images.name: Bagent, Alexander combine for Bears TD
images.caption: Tyson Bagent finds Maurice Alexander who runs into the end zone for a Bears touchdown vs. the Dolphins in NFL preseason.

articles.headline: 'Nervous' Travis Hunter makes strong first impression with Jaguars
articles.description: Rookie wide receiver and cornerback Travis Hunter quieted the nerves with a strong first impression, playing 18 snaps in the Jaguars' 31-25 loss to the Steelers.

images.name: Travis Hunter makes his first two catches on first preseason drive
images.caption: Travis Hunter makes a quick impact in the Jaguars' preseason opener with two catches on the first drive.
